name: Super Snake
overview: In the game SUPER SNAKE is a serpent with a lot of skill moves who jets across the screen. However, you mustn't touch the walls or run into the venomous Krusuters, also beware eating the poisonous mushrooms . Can you survive long enough to win the game? Slither yourself into a lot of points with SUPER SNAKE. (Was also re-released in 2000)
